dct_description_sm: California, unlabelled, as an island of Briggs type, with flat northern coast. Northwestern coastline of North America starts to extend west near 60 deg. N. Includes partial, but extensive, outlines of Australia (or Antarctica), and south polar region labelled Terres Australes.
LC 3447, 4280; BN Manesson-Mallet I A(623)& I B; Faupel's Americana 91/37
At page top, above map: DE L'AMERIQUE. [page] 269 [,] FIGURE CXVI. [Page]269 (map top right). Issued in his: Description de l'univers, Tome V, Paris, 1683.

At page top, above map: das Neue Veste Landt oder America. Fig 7. With French title inside border and German title outside border. Issued in his German edition: Beschreibung des ganzen Welt-Kreisses ..., V, Franckfurt, 1684. Issued in his German edition: Beschreibung des gantzen weltkreises …, J.A. Jung … Franckfurt am Mayn, 1719.
